movieDescription: Details: Directed: Shankar Bhanu Stars: Tejus Kancherla, Paayal Rajput, Dr V.K. Naresh, Nagineedu, Adityamenon Dialogues: Parashuram Lyrics: Bhaskar Bhatla Editor: Prawin Pudi Choreographer: Ganesh Swamy Executive Producer: Chinna D.O.P: C Ram Prasad Music: Radhan Co-Producer: C V Rao Producer: C Kalyan

movieInfo:
Directed by: Prithviraj Sukumaran
Written by: Murali Gopy
Starring by: Mohanlal, Vivek Oberoi, Manju Warrier
Genres: Action, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The death of chief minister PK Ramdas has his party search of his successor. Ramdas’ son-in-law Bobby comes with an offer for funds, and a means to wrest power while pushing his illegitimate business. But, there’s one man standing in his way – Stephen Nedumpally.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Prashant Kumar
Starring by: Priyadarshi, Rahul Ramakrishna, Ravi Varma
Genres: Comedy, Crime, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: After getting fired from his boring job Sai who is to get married in three days time, goes drinking with his friend Jani, his house gets robbed. Sai loses everything including the diamond necklace later in the evening he gets into a stupid challenge with his NRI friend Krishna. Sai and Jani take up the challenge that Sai wont get married until they find the thief. Their mad caper begins when they meet up dude, a pot-smoking slacker loafing aimlessly with his pet goat. They are running against time and desperate, with just three days for Sai to get married. In this journey of self-exploration, they are neck deep in trouble. Will they find what they are looking for? Only time will tell.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Kodi Ramakrishna
Starring by: Ramya, Vishnuvardhan, Diganth
Genres: Action, Thriller, Fantasy
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Its about a woman transforming into a snake to seek revenge. The film starts with a flashback character called Naganika (Ramya) who is a big personality in her city. She and her forefathers have been saving an ancient monument since hundreds of years. Evil Tantrik Kapali (Rajesh Vivek) and his forefathers have been fighting with Naganika`s family for many years to occupy this Lord Shiva Monument.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Shiva Gangadhar
Starring by: Maheedhar, Sonakshi Singh Rawat
Genres: Drama, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Prashanth (Mahidar) is a graduate without tensions, leading his life. Nandini (Sonakshi Singh) is a highly motivated girl, with her family having a conservative life. What if these two contrasting characters fall in love with each other? What kind of differences of philosophy exist between them? How will they solve their problems?

movieInfo:
Directed by: M V PRASAD
Starring by: TEJAS, KARISHMA KARPAL, SEEMA PARMAR
Genres: Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Manasa Vaacha is a love story weaved around young scientists working on cutting edge cancer research and are on the verge of finding cure for cancer and their personal struggles to save their love and the research.

movieInfo:
Directed by: M Adiseshasai Reddy
Starring by: Sakshi Chowdhary, Posani Krishna Murali, Getup Srinu
Genres: Action, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: A slice of today’s youth! Their misplaced goals and misjudgments! How not to succeed in life! How to choose right path? How to make right choice in life?

movieInfo:
Directed by: Kotendra Duyala
Starring by: Raghav, Karronya Katrynn
Genres: Action, Comedy
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Balaraju(Raghav) is a happy go lucky youth who spends most of the time with his close friends. In one unexpected incident, he spots the eyes of Bangari(Karonya) and falls in love with them. After a point of time, he comes to know that the girl and the eyes he loves are none other than of Bangari.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Sunil Reddy
Starring by: Sai Dharam Tej, Larissa Bonesi, Mannara Chopra
Genres: Action, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Aditya(Sai Dharam Tej) is a happy go lucky employee who falls in love with Anjali(Larissa Bonessi). The twist in the tale arises when complications erupt between the couple and they break up with each other. Depressed with this, Aditya calls for a breakup party with his friends. A freaky incident during the party changes the course of Aditya’s life. New characters like a dreaded don, a prostitute and heroine’s father create even more confusion in the proceedings.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Paruchuri Murali
Written by: G.G.V.K. Chiranjeevi
Starring by: Jagapathi Babu, Darshana Banik, Brahmanandam
Genres: Action, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Siddharth(Nara Rohit) is a reputed film director who gets arrested for his wife’s(Darshana) murder. During the course of the case, a high-profile public prosecutor called Veerendra(Jagapathi Babu) fights Siddharth’s case and sets him free of all charges. The twist in the tale arises when Veerendra finds out that the murder mystery has a different set up completely.

movieInfo:
Created by: Sharad Devarajan, S.S. Rajamouli
Starring by: Viral Adhav, Manini M. Mishra, Manoj Pandey
Genres: Animation, Action, Adventure
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Before the war with the Kalakeya. Before Katappa killed Baahubali. Before the death of Sivagami. Two young brothers competed for the throne. One would go on to become king, and the other would go on to become a legend. Experience the secret stories from the world of Baahubali in this all new animated series.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Dilip Kumar Salvadi
Starring by: Dilip Kumar Salvadi, Chandni Bhagwanani, Chatrapathi Sekhar
Genres: Crime, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Dileep(Dilip Kumar) gets a call from an unknown person to transfer two parcels to a particular area failing which his parents will get killed mercilessly. Scared with this, Dileep does the needful and transfers the parcels to the unknown person. To his shock, the unknown person reveals that the persons in the parcels were Dileep’s own parents. The unknown person now leaves a condition with Dileep to surrender to him within 24 hours.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Sarjun
Written by: Priyanka Ravindran
Starring by: Nayanthara, Kalaiyarasan, Yogi Babu
Genres: Horror
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: A young woman, who goes to her grandmother’s home in Pollachi, realises the presence of something supernatural in the place. Meanwhile, mysterious murders are happening in Chennai. How are these seemingly unrelated events connected?

movieInfo:
Directed by: Prudhveedatta
Starring by: Vamsi Krishna, Priyanka Agistin
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Anand (debutant Virat Konduri) and Lakshmi (Simrat Kaur) have been friends since childhood. They are neighbours and their fathers, played by Rajeev Kanakala and Prithvi, respectively, are Indian Railways colleagues. While Lakshmi has strong feelings for Anand, the former’s father routinely picks up arguments with the latter’s father. This tension spills over into the relationship between the lead pair.

movieInfo:
Directed by: K.S. Nageswara Rao
Starring by: Babu Mohan, Neha Deshpande, Arjun Reddy
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Siddhu(Arjun Reddy) and Avani(Neha Deshpande) fall in love with each other and spend some cozy times together. But their love story does not go well with Avani’s dad(Suman). Left with no choice, he lays a weird condition to Siddhu in order to marry his daughter.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Shyam
Starring by: Rakendu Mouli, Shradhaa Das, Diksha Pant, Divya sri, Sudharshan, Nala venu, Anupurna, Anya, Deepali
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The story revolves around a boy who’s many attempts to learn more about sex and get close to any woman ends up in bad luck. Ever since his adolescent years his attempts like – reading adult magazines ends up getting caught with by his uncle. During his final years of high school, he gets hold of a porn CD which his grandmother accidentally sees and dies of a heart attack. While in college he makes a bold attempt of hitting on his own professor and ends up embarking himself. His friends and family know of his ill fate and often pull’s his leg with this which is a huge embarrassment for him. He often gives into the peer pressure and takes drastic steps to shed his tag. The story progresses chronologically with him trying to have sex or learn more about it at various stages of his life but all his attempts end in failure. He is shrouded in a feeling of worry and fear during his marriage as he fears his wife may also meet the same fate.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Sripada Vishwak
Starring by: Siva Kantamneni, Ravi Babu
Genres Drama, Action, Suspense
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: In order to get out of a hit and run case, five friends decide to bribe an eye witness by looting black money of a reputed politician KK (Ravi Babu). Soon after reaching his place, friends face a problem in the form of a visually challenged person called Yogi (Siva Kantamneni).
